name: Note Shredder
description:
Follow the rhythm to fight your opponent! Hit enough notes, and you win! Miss enough notes, and you have to go on the defensive! Hands on home row, and get ready to fight! 

Note: This game was made in less than 48 hours for the 2017 ICT gamejam.  Two of the songs, including "GameJam Jam" were made during this time specifically for this game! Please enjoy!
